profile.desc: Manage general information used in VERNECT's product and services.

info.title: Profile
info.imageDesc: Updating your profile picture makes it easier for other Members to find you
info.name: Name
info.nameDesc: Your name is used for payment purchase management and account security management.
info.nicknameDesc: Your nickname is shared to other Members using VIRNECT services

account.title: Account details
account.emailDesc: You cannot change an email address you used for registration
account.passwordDesc: Frequent password changes increase your security.

additional.title: Additional user information
additional.desc: Additional user information is used in the verification process if the user forgets email address.
additional.recoveryEmailEmpty: Recovery email address is not updated

imageChangeModal.title: Profile Image Settings
imageChangeModal.desc: Your profile picture will be shared to all registered VIRNECT users
imageChangeModal.caution: Up to 5Mb of Jpg or Png files can be uploaded

message.fail: Failed to upload an image file, please try again later.

nameChangeModal.title: Name settings
nameChangeModal.desc: If you change the name the changed name is applied to VIRNECT products and services.
nameChangeModal.caution: * For the purposes of account security frequent name changes may be restricted when using products and services. Updating a changed name may take some time.

message.fail: Failed to update your name please try again later

nicknameChangeModal.title: Nickname settings
nicknameChangeModal.desc: When editing your nickname it will be applied to our products and services

message.fail: Failed to edit your nickname please try again later.
message.caution: Please enter 20 characters or less. You can use Korean English special characters (excluding (>), (<)) and spaces.

passwordChangeModal.title: Reset Password
passwordChangeModal.desc: Resetting your password. Log in again using your new password.
passwordChangeModal.caution:
Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).
Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.

message.fail: Failed to edit your nickname please try again later
message.duplicate: You cannot use the previously used passwords for your new password
message.invalid: Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 3 of following character types. - Uppercase letter - Lowercase letter- Number - Special character ( .  ! @ # $ % ). Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.

birthChangeModal.title: Date of birth Settings
birthChangeModal.ageLimit: Users under the age of 14 cannot sign up and use the service.

message.success: Successfully updated your date of birth.
message.fail: Failed to update your date of birth please try again later.

marketInfoReceive.title: Agree to receive promotional offers
marketInfoReceive.contents: Receive emails about VIRNECT's new products services and promotional offers.

message.success: You have agreed to receive our marketing promotions.
message.fail: Failed to update please try again later.

secession.title: Delete account
secession.caution: You cannot rejoin with the email that you have left. The account and data cannot be recovered, so please proceed with the membership withdrawal careful.
secession.secessionReasonDesk: Select the main reason for withdrawing your membership
secessionSelect: Not satisfied with our products and services
secession.secessionReasonEtc: State the reason for your withdrawal from the membership
secession.done: I agree to all the terms for deleting your account.

message.fail: Failed to update contact details please try again later.

message.success: Successfully updated your recovery email address.
message.fail: Failed to update your recovery email address please try again later.
